item.description:
At last, again! Sally's Fish Camp with a reservation under Betsy/Meetup @ 6:45pm March 5th 2008. 40% off bottles of wine on Wednesdays! They claim to serve the biggest shrimp you've ever seen, Lobster corn dog appetizer, whole grilled striped bass. and meat entrees too if that's your preference.

Go to their website http://www.sallysfish...
and see the menu which looks fantastic! Also click on "Join our email list" at the bottom left to get $10.00 off per table.

We will have two tables in the South side room to accommodate up to 22 people. Please bring cash as they are not going to do separate checks.

Kelly and I have wanted to eat here for a while now. Hope to see you there!

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: SALLY'S FISH CAMP March 5th
